general: Always start with a clean, moisturized face for the best makeup application.
Use a primer to help your makeup last longer and create a smooth base.
Blend, blend, blend! Good blending is the key to a flawless look.
Set your foundation with a light dusting of translucent powder.
Don't forget to blend your foundation down your neck for a seamless finish.
soft-glam: For soft glam, focus on subtle shimmer and soft blending.
Use neutral tones with a pop of shimmer on the inner corners of your eyes.
Keep your base dewy and natural-looking for that soft glam aesthetic.
Opt for matte lipsticks in nude or soft pink shades.
Add a touch of highlighter to your cheekbones for a subtle glow.
clean-girl: The clean girl aesthetic is all about minimal, fresh-looking makeup.
Focus on skincare-first - let your natural skin shine through.
Use a tinted moisturizer or light coverage foundation.
Keep brows natural and fluffy, just brushed up with clear gel.
A swipe of mascara and a tinted lip balm is all you need!
coquette: Coquette looks are all about pink, rosy tones and soft femininity.
Think pink blush on the apples of your cheeks and nose bridge.
Use soft pink or berry-toned lip colors for that romantic feel.
Add a touch of shimmer to your eyelids for a dreamy look.
Keep everything soft and blended - no harsh lines!
bold: Bold looks call for strong colors and defined features.
Don't be afraid to go dramatic with your eyeshadow or lip color.
Use a bold lip liner to define your lips before applying color.
High contrast works well - pair bold lips with softer eyes or vice versa.
Make sure your base is flawless to balance out bold features.
